Class LdaptiveResourceCRLFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.adaptors.x509.authentication.handler.support.ResourceCRLFetcher

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CRLFetcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoolingLdaptiveResourceCRLFetcher

    public class LdaptiveResourceCRLFetcher
extends ResourceCRLFetcher
    Fetches a CRL from an LDAP instance.

    4.1
    Author:
    Daniel Fisher

      • fetchCRLFromLdap

        protected X509CRL fetchCRLFromLdap(Object r)
                            throws Exception
        Downloads a CRL from given LDAP url.
        Parameters:
        r - the resource that is the ldap url.
        Returns:
        the x 509 cRL
        Throws:
        Exception - if connection to ldap fails, or attribute to get the revocation list is unavailable

      • fetchX509CRLFromAttribute

        protected X509CRL fetchX509CRLFromAttribute(org.ldaptive.LdapAttribute aval)
                                     throws Exception
        Gets x509 cRL from attribute. Retrieves the binary attribute value, decodes it to base64, and fetches it as a byte-array resource.
        Parameters:
        aval - the attribute, which may be null if it's not found
        Returns:
        the x 509 cRL from attribute
        Throws:
        Exception - if attribute not found or could could not be decoded.
